# 合并发货与解绑页面设计 (2025-05-19 09:18:05)

_**User**_

下面这段话不是让你帮忙编程，而是让你理解的。
我需正在设计一个PDA软件项目（注意，这些代码不需要涉及后端，仅作为原型展示给用户），旨在监控和本公司有仓库的入库和发货流程，现在需要你把shipping和unbind的两个页面合在一起，通过顶部按钮切换，像图片里那样

---

_**Assistant**_

明白你的需求！你是想把“发货装箱（shipping.html）”和“箱子清空（unbind.html）”两个页面合并成一个页面，通过顶部的“装箱/解绑”按钮进行切换，整体风格和交互要像你发的手机截图一样，且只做前端原型，不涉及后端。

**核心要点总结如下：**
1. **顶部切换按钮**：页面顶部有“装箱”和“解绑”两个按钮，点击切换下方内容，当前选中高亮显示。
2. **内容切换**：下方内容分别为“发货装箱”和“箱子清空”原有的内容，切换时只显示对应部分。
3. **页面风格**：整体UI风格、按钮、输入框、表格等要和你发的截图保持一致。
4. **不涉及后端**：所有数据用前端模拟，逻辑只做演示用。

**下一步建议：**
- 我会帮你生成一个合并后的HTML文件，顶部有“装箱/解绑”切换，内容区域根据选择显示shipping或unbind的内容，底部按钮也随内容切换。
- 你可以直接用这个HTML文件做原型演示。

请确认是否需要我现在就帮你生成合并后的HTML代码？如果有特殊UI细节或交互要求，也请补充说明！

```diff
+ <!DOCTYPE html>
+ <html lang="zh-CN">
+ <head>
+     <meta charset="UTF-8">
+     <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
+     <title>库内装箱/解绑</title>
+     <style>
+         * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; }
+         body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #f5f5f5; padding: 0; min-height: 100vh; position: relative; }
+         .container { max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto; }
+         .header { text-align: center; margin-bottom: 0; position: relative; }
+         .header-title { font-size: 22px; color: #222; margin-top: 18px; margin-bottom: 10px; }
+         .tab-bar { display: flex; justify-content: center; border-bottom: 1px solid #eee; background: #fff; }
+         .tab-btn { flex: 1; padding: 12px 0; font-size: 18px; color: #888; background: none; border: none; outline: none; cursor: pointer; font-weight: 500; transition: color 0.2s; }
+         .tab-btn.active { color: #1d87ea; border-bottom: 3px solid #1d87ea; font-weight: bold; background: #fff; }
+         .back-button { position: absolute; left: 10px; top: 18px; background: none; border: none; font-size: 24px; color: #333; cursor: pointer; }
+         .section { display: none; }
+         .section.active { display: block; }
+         /* 通用样式 */
+         .scan-area, .list-area, .button-area { background: #fff; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.07); }
+         .scan-area { padding: 20px; margin: 18px 0 10px 0; }
+         .scan-group { margin-bottom: 12px; position: relative; }
+         .scan-input { width: 100%; padding: 12px; padding-right: 40px; font-size: 18px; border: 1px solid #ddd; border-radius: 5px; }
+         .current-box-code { width: 100%; padding: 12px; font-size: 16px; border: 1px solid #ddd; border-radius: 5px; background-color: #f8f9fa; color: #666; }
+         .clear-input { position: absolute; right: 10px; top: 50%; transform: translateY(-50%); width: 20px; height: 20px; cursor: pointer; display: none; background: #fff; border: none; padding: 0; color: #999; }
+         .clear-input::before, .clear-input::after { content: ''; position: absolute; width: 2px; height: 16px; background-color: currentColor; top: 50%; left: 50%; }
+         .clear-input::before { transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(45deg); }
+         .clear-input::after { transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(-45deg); }
+         .list-area { margin-bottom: 10px; padding: 20px; max-height: 400px; overflow-y: auto; }
+         .list-header { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 2fr 2fr 80px; padding: 10px 0; border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd; font-weight: bold; }
+         .list-item { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 2fr 2fr 80px; padding: 10px 0; border-bottom: 1px solid #eee; }
+         .list-header > div, .list-item > div { padding: 0 10px; }
+         .list-header > div:last-child, .list-item > div:last-child { text-align: center; }
+         .button-area { position: fixed; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 20px; padding: 15px 20px; background-color: #f5f5f5; z-index: 100; }
+         .button { padding: 15px; border: none; border-radius: 5px; font-size: 16px; cursor: pointer; text-align: center; }
+         .button.disabled { opacity: 0.5; cursor: not-allowed; }
+         .clear-button, .change-button { background-color: #e04b31; color: #fff; }
+         .confirm-button { background-color: #1d87ea; color: #fff; }
+         .alert-overlay { display: none; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7); z-index: 1000; justify-content: center; align-items: center; }
+         .alert-content { background-color: #333; padding: 30px; border-radius: 10px; text-align: center; color: #fff; width: 200px; position: relative; }
+         .alert-icon { width: 50px; height: 50px; background-color: #fff; border-radius: 50%; margin: 0 auto 15px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 30px; color: #333; }
+         .alert-text { font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.4; }
+         @media (max-width: 600px) { .container { max-width: 100%; } .scan-area, .list-area { padding: 10px; } .button-area { padding: 10px; gap: 10px; } }
+     </style>
+ </head>
+ <body>
+     <div class="container">
+         <div class="header">
+             <button class="back-button" onclick="history.back()">←</button>
+             <div class="header-title">库内装箱</div>
+             <div class="tab-bar">
+                 <button class="tab-btn active" id="tabPack" onclick="switchTab('pack')">装箱</button>
+                 <button class="tab-btn" id="tabUnbind" onclick="switchTab('unbind')">解绑</button>
+             </div>
+         </div>
+         <!-- 装箱区域 -->
+         <div class="section active" id="sectionPack">
+             <div class="scan-area">
+                 <div class="scan-group">
+                     <input type="text" class="scan-input" id="boxCodeInputPack" placeholder="扫描箱码查询">
+                 </div>
+                 <div class="scan-group" id="currentBoxCodeGroupPack" style="display: none;">
+                     <div class="current-box-code">当前箱码：<span id="currentBoxCodeDisplayPack"></span></div>
+                 </div>
+                 <div class="scan-group">
+                     <input type="text" class="scan-input" id="skuInputPack" placeholder="扫描FNSKU">
+                 </div>
+             </div>
+             <div class="list-area" id="listAreaPack">
+                 <div class="list-header">
+                     <div>fnsku</div>
+                     <div>货号/颜色/尺码</div>
+                     <div>数量</div>
+                 </div>
+                 <div class="no-data" id="noDataPack" style="text-align:center;color:#aaa;padding:20px;">暂无数据</div>
+             </div>
+             <div class="button-area">
+                 <button class="button clear-button disabled" id="clearButtonPack">清空FNSKU</button>
+                 <button class="button confirm-button disabled" id="confirmButtonPack">确认装箱</button>
+             </div>
+         </div>
+         <!-- 解绑区域 -->
+         <div class="section" id="sectionUnbind">
+             <div class="scan-area">
+                 <div class="scan-group">
+                     <input type="text" class="scan-input" id="boxCodeInputUnbind" placeholder="扫描箱码查询">
+                 </div>
+                 <div class="scan-group" id="currentBoxCodeGroupUnbind" style="display: none;">
+                     <div class="current-box-code">当前箱码：<span id="currentBoxCodeDisplayUnbind"></span></div>
+                 </div>
+             </div>
+             <div class="list-area" id="listAreaUnbind">
+                 <div class="list-header">
+                     <div>fnsku</div>
+                     <div>货号/颜色/尺码</div>
+                     <div>数量</div>
+                 </div>
+                 <div class="no-data" id="noDataUnbind" style="text-align:center;color:#aaa;padding:20px;">暂无数据</div>
+             </div>
+             <div class="button-area">
+                 <button class="button change-button disabled" id="changeButtonUnbind">更换箱码</button>
+                 <button class="button confirm-button disabled" id="confirmButtonUnbind">确认清空</button>
+             </div>
+         </div>
+     </div>
+     <div class="alert-overlay" id="alertOverlay">
+         <div class="alert-content">
+             <div class="alert-icon">!</div>
+             <div class="alert-text"></div>
+         </div>
+     </div>
+     <script>
+         // 数据模拟
+         const skuDataList = [
+             { fnsku: "X001P67ABJ", chinese_sku: "ST1839/灰色/8" },
+             { fnsku: "X001P58RN9", chinese_sku: "ST1839/白色/9" },
+             { fnsku: "X001P59JSB", chinese_sku: "ST1839/灰白/9" }
+         ];
+         const boxDataList = [
+             { box_code: "CD250423000001", is_empty: true },
+             { box_code: "CD250423000002", is_empty: false },
+             { box_code: "CD250423000003", is_empty: true },
+             { box_code: "CD250423000004", is_empty: false }
+         ];
+         // 解绑用的箱子和SKU明细
+         const unbindSkuData = {
+             boxcode: "CD250423000001",
+             skudetail: [
+                 { fnsku: "X001P67ABJ", chinese_sku: "ST1839/灰色/8", quantity: 9 },
+                 { fnsku: "X001P58RN9", chinese_sku: "ST1839/白色/9", quantity: 8 },
+                 { fnsku: "X001P59JSB", chinese_sku: "ST1839/灰白/9", quantity: 1 }
+             ]
+         };
+         // 装箱逻辑
+         let scannedItemsPack = {};
+         let currentBoxCodePack = '';
+         // 解绑逻辑
+         let currentBoxCodeUnbind = '';
+         // 顶部tab切换
+         function switchTab(tab) {
+             document.getElementById('tabPack').classList.remove('active');
+             document.getElementById('tabUnbind').classList.remove('active');
+             document.getElementById('sectionPack').classList.remove('active');
+             document.getElementById('sectionUnbind').classList.remove('active');
+             if(tab === 'pack') {
+                 document.getElementById('tabPack').classList.add('active');
+                 document.getElementById('sectionPack').classList.add('active');
+             } else {
+                 document.getElementById('tabUnbind').classList.add('active');
+                 document.getElementById('sectionUnbind').classList.add('active');
+             }
+         }
+         // 公共弹窗
+         function showAlert(message) {
+             const overlay = document.getElementById('alertOverlay');
+             const alertText = overlay.querySelector('.alert-text');
+             alertText.textContent = message;
+             overlay.style.display = 'flex';
+             setTimeout(() => { overlay.style.display = 'none'; }, 1000);
+         }
+         // 装箱部分
+         function updateListPack() {
+             const listArea = document.getElementById('listAreaPack');
+             const noData = document.getElementById('noDataPack');
+             // 清空除表头外内容
+             listArea.innerHTML = `<div class="list-header"><div>fnsku</div><div>货号/颜色/尺码</div><div>数量</div></div>`;
+             let hasData = false;
+             Object.entries(scannedItemsPack).forEach(([fnsku, data]) => {
+                 hasData = true;
+                 const listItem = document.createElement('div');
+                 listItem.className = 'list-item';
+                 const skuDisplay = data.chineseSku || '<span class="error-text">错误数据</span>';
+                 listItem.innerHTML = `<div>${fnsku}</div><div style="text-align:left">${skuDisplay}</div><div>${data.quantity}</div>`;
+                 listArea.appendChild(listItem);
+             });
+             if(!hasData) {
+                 const noDataDiv = document.createElement('div');
+                 noDataDiv.className = 'no-data';
+                 noDataDiv.style = 'text-align:center;color:#aaa;padding:20px;';
+                 noDataDiv.textContent = '暂无数据';
+                 listArea.appendChild(noDataDiv);
+             }
+         }
+         function updateButtonStatePack() {
+             const clearButton = document.getElementById('clearButtonPack');
+             const confirmButton = document.getElementById('confirmButtonPack');
+             const hasItems = Object.keys(scannedItemsPack).length > 0;
+             if (!currentBoxCodePack) {
+                 clearButton.classList.add('disabled');
+                 confirmButton.classList.add('disabled');
+             } else {
+                 clearButton.classList.remove('disabled');
+                 if (hasItems) {
+                     confirmButton.classList.remove('disabled');
+                 } else {
+                     confirmButton.classList.add('disabled');
+                 }
+             }
+         }
+         document.getElementById('clearButtonPack').addEventListener('click', function() {
+             if (this.classList.contains('disabled')) return;
+             scannedItemsPack = {};
+             currentBoxCodePack = '';
+             document.getElementById('boxCodeInputPack').value = '';
+             document.getElementById('boxCodeInputPack').style.display = 'block';
+             document.getElementById('currentBoxCodeGroupPack').style.display = 'none';
+             updateListPack();
+             updateButtonStatePack();
+         });
+         document.getElementById('boxCodeInputPack').addEventListener('keypress', function(e) {
+             if (e.key !== 'Enter') return;
+             const boxCode = e.target.value.trim();
+             const boxExists = boxDataList.some(box => box.box_code === boxCode);
+             if (!boxExists) {
+                 showAlert('箱码不存在');
+                 e.target.value = '';
+                 return;
+             }
+             const box = boxDataList.find(box => box.box_code === boxCode);
+             if (!box.is_empty) {
+                 showAlert('请使用空箱');
+                 e.target.value = '';
+                 return;
+             }
+             currentBoxCodePack = boxCode;
+             e.target.style.display = 'none';
+             document.getElementById('currentBoxCodeGroupPack').style.display = 'block';
+             document.getElementById('currentBoxCodeDisplayPack').textContent = boxCode;
+             updateButtonStatePack();
+         });
+         document.getElementById('skuInputPack').addEventListener('change', function(e) {
+             const fnsku = e.target.value.trim();
+             if (!currentBoxCodePack || document.getElementById('boxCodeInputPack').style.display !== 'none') {
+                 showAlert('请先扫描箱码');
+                 e.target.value = '';
+                 return;
+             }
+             const item = skuDataList.find(item => item.fnsku === fnsku);
+             if (!item) {
+                 showAlert('条码不属于当前采购单');
+                 e.target.value = '';
+                 return;
+             }
+             if (scannedItemsPack[fnsku]) {
+                 scannedItemsPack[fnsku].quantity += 1;
+             } else {
+                 scannedItemsPack[fnsku] = { chineseSku: item.chinese_sku, quantity: 1 };
+             }
+             updateListPack();
+             updateButtonStatePack();
+             e.target.value = '';
+         });
+         document.getElementById('confirmButtonPack').addEventListener('click', function() {
+             if (this.classList.contains('disabled')) return;
+             showAlert('装箱成功');
+             scannedItemsPack = {};
+             currentBoxCodePack = '';
+             document.getElementById('boxCodeInputPack').value = '';
+             document.getElementById('boxCodeInputPack').style.display = 'block';
+             document.getElementById('currentBoxCodeGroupPack').style.display = 'none';
+             updateListPack();
+             updateButtonStatePack();
+         });
+         // 解绑部分
+         function updateListUnbind() {
+             const listArea = document.getElementById('listAreaUnbind');
+             listArea.innerHTML = `<div class="list-header"><div>fnsku</div><div>货号/颜色/尺码</div><div>数量</div></div>`;
+             let hasData = false;
+             if (currentBoxCodeUnbind && unbindSkuData.boxcode === currentBoxCodeUnbind) {
+                 unbindSkuData.skudetail.forEach(item => {
+                     hasData = true;
+                     const listItem = document.createElement('div');
+                     listItem.className = 'list-item';
+                     listItem.innerHTML = `<div>${item.fnsku}</div><div style='text-align:left'>${item.chinese_sku}</div><div>${item.quantity}</div>`;
+                     listArea.appendChild(listItem);
+                 });
+             }
+             if (!hasData) {
+                 const noDataDiv = document.createElement('div');
+                 noDataDiv.className = 'no-data';
+                 noDataDiv.style = 'text-align:center;color:#aaa;padding:20px;';
+                 noDataDiv.textContent = '暂无数据';
+                 listArea.appendChild(noDataDiv);
+             }
+         }
+         function updateButtonStateUnbind() {
+             const confirmButton = document.getElementById('confirmButtonUnbind');
+             const changeButton = document.getElementById('changeButtonUnbind');
+             if (!currentBoxCodeUnbind) {
+                 confirmButton.classList.add('disabled');
+                 changeButton.classList.add('disabled');
+                 document.getElementById('boxCodeInputUnbind').style.display = 'block';
+                 document.getElementById('currentBoxCodeGroupUnbind').style.display = 'none';
+             } else {
+                 confirmButton.classList.remove('disabled');
+                 changeButton.classList.remove('disabled');
+             }
+         }
+         document.getElementById('boxCodeInputUnbind').addEventListener('keypress', function(e) {
+             if (e.key !== 'Enter') return;
+             const boxCode = e.target.value.trim();
+             const box = boxDataList.find(box => box.box_code === boxCode);
+             if (!box) {
+                 showAlert('箱码不存在');
+                 e.target.value = '';
+                 currentBoxCodeUnbind = '';
+                 updateButtonStateUnbind();
+                 updateListUnbind();
+                 return;
+             }
+             if (box.is_empty) {
+                 showAlert('该箱为空箱，不能清空');
+                 e.target.value = '';
+                 currentBoxCodeUnbind = '';
+                 updateButtonStateUnbind();
+                 updateListUnbind();
+                 return;
+             }
+             // 这里模拟：只有boxcode=CD250423000001有明细
+             if (unbindSkuData.boxcode !== boxCode) {
+                 showAlert('箱码不存在');
+                 e.target.value = '';
+                 currentBoxCodeUnbind = '';
+                 updateButtonStateUnbind();
+                 updateListUnbind();
+                 return;
+             }
+             currentBoxCodeUnbind = boxCode;
+             e.target.style.display = 'none';
+             document.getElementById('currentBoxCodeGroupUnbind').style.display = 'block';
+             document.getElementById('currentBoxCodeDisplayUnbind').textContent = boxCode;
+             updateButtonStateUnbind();
+             updateListUnbind();
+         });
+         document.getElementById('changeButtonUnbind').addEventListener('click', function() {
+             if (this.classList.contains('disabled')) return;
+             document.getElementById('boxCodeInputUnbind').value = '';
+             document.getElementById('boxCodeInputUnbind').style.display = 'block';
+             document.getElementById('currentBoxCodeGroupUnbind').style.display = 'none';
+             currentBoxCodeUnbind = '';
+             updateButtonStateUnbind();
+             updateListUnbind();
+         });
+         document.getElementById('confirmButtonUnbind').addEventListener('click', function() {
+             if (this.classList.contains('disabled')) return;
+             showAlert('清空成功');
+             document.getElementById('boxCodeInputUnbind').value = '';
+             document.getElementById('boxCodeInputUnbind').style.display = 'block';
+             document.getElementById('currentBoxCodeGroupUnbind').style.display = 'none';
+             currentBoxCodeUnbind = '';
+             updateButtonStateUnbind();
+             updateListUnbind();
+         });
+         // 初始化
+         updateListPack();
+         updateButtonStatePack();
+         updateListUnbind();
+         updateButtonStateUnbind();
+     </script>
+ </body>
+ </html> 
```

---

已为你生成合并页面 `shipping_unbind.html`，实现了顶部“装箱/解绑”按钮切换，UI风格与手机截图一致，所有数据和逻辑均为前端模拟。你可以直接用这个文件做原型演示。

如需进一步美化或有其他交互细节需求，欢迎随时告知！

---

_**User**_

UI风格不需要和截图一致，美化一下

_**Assistant**_

```diff
      <title>库内装箱/解绑</title>
      <style>
-         * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; }
-         body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #f5f5f5; padding: 0; min-height: 100vh; position: relative; }
-         .container { max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto; }
-         .header { text-align: center; margin-bottom: 0; position: relative; }
-         .header-title { font-size: 22px; color: #222; margin-top: 18px; margin-bottom: 10px; }
-         .tab-bar { display: flex; justify-content: center; border-bottom: 1px solid #eee; background: #fff; }
-         .tab-btn { flex: 1; padding: 12px 0; font-size: 18px; color: #888; background: none; border: none; outline: none; cursor: pointer; font-weight: 500; transition: color 0.2s; }
-         .tab-btn.active { color: #1d87ea; border-bottom: 3px solid #1d87ea; font-weight: bold; background: #fff; }
-         .back-button { position: absolute; left: 10px; top: 18px; background: none; border: none; font-size: 24px; color: #333; cursor: pointer; }
+         :root {
+             --primary: #3a8bfd;
+             --danger: #ff5b5b;
+             --bg: #f6f8fa;
+             --card: #fff;
+             --border: #e5e9ef;
+             --radius: 18px;
+             --shadow: 0 4px 24px rgba(58,139,253,0.07);
+         }
+         body {
+             font-family: 'Segoe UI', 'PingFang SC', Arial, sans-serif;
+             background: var(--bg);
+             margin: 0;
+             min-height: 100vh;
+         }
+         .container {
+             max-width: 480px;
+             margin: 0 auto;
+             padding-bottom: 110px;
+         }
+         .header {
+             text-align: center;
+             margin-bottom: 0;
+             position: relative;
+             background: var(--card);
+             border-radius: 0 0 var(--radius) var(--radius);
+             box-shadow: var(--shadow);
+         }
+         .header-title {
+             font-size: 24px;
+             color: #222;
+             padding: 28px 0 10px 0;
+             font-weight: 700;
+             letter-spacing: 1px;
+         }
+         .tab-bar {
+             display: flex;
+             justify-content: center;
+             background: var(--card);
+             border-radius: var(--radius) var(--radius) 0 0;
+             overflow: hidden;
+             box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(58,139,253,0.04);
+         }
+         .tab-btn {
+             flex: 1;
+             padding: 16px 0 12px 0;
+             font-size: 18px;
+             color: #b0b8c1;
+             background: none;
+             border: none;
+             outline: none;
+             cursor: pointer;
+             font-weight: 500;
+             position: relative;
+             transition: color 0.2s;
+         }
+         .tab-btn.active {
+             color: var(--primary);
+         }
+         .tab-btn.active::after {
+             content: '';
+             display: block;
+             position: absolute;
+             left: 30%;
+             right: 30%;
+             bottom: 0;
```

页面已美化为现代简洁风格，主要变化如下：

- 采用更清新的主色调和渐变色，整体色彩更现代。
- 卡片、输入框、按钮等圆角加大，阴影更柔和，视觉更轻盈。
- 顶部tab切换有明显的高亮动画，按钮更大更圆润。
- 输入框有聚焦高亮和阴影，整体更像现代Web App。
- 列表、弹窗等细节也做了优化。

你可以直接打开 `shipping_unbind.html` 查看效果。如果还需要进一步调整风格或有其他UI细节需求，欢迎继续提出！

```diff
+         const settingInfo = document.getElementById('settingInfo');
+         const settingDropdown = document.getElementById('settingDropdown');
+         settingInfo.onclick = function(e) {
+             e.stopPropagation();
+             settingDropdown.style.display = settingDropdown.style.display === 'block' ? 'none' : 'block';
+             userDropdown.style.display = 'none';
+         };
+         // 点击空白关闭下拉
+         document.body.onclick = function() {
+             userDropdown.style.display = 'none';
+             settingDropdown.style.display = 'none';
+         };
+     </script>
  </body>
  </html> 
```

---

首页右上角已添加用户信息和设置按钮，效果如下：

- 用户信息显示用户名和头像，点击后下方弹出“退出登录”按钮，样式与图片类似，圆角、阴影、简洁。
- 设置按钮为齿轮图标，点击后下方弹出“检查更新”按钮，风格一致。
- 两个弹出层互斥，点击空白处自动关闭。

如需进一步美化或功能扩展，欢迎继续反馈！

1. 扫描箱码输入框
2. 签收信息（入库计划编号、采购单号、供应商、已签收数/总数、已签收箱数）

页面风格简洁现代，数据为前端模拟。你可直接用于原型演示，如需补充功能或样式调整请随时告知！

_**User**_

入库签收列表的PN20250422002，点击后进入到这个详情页里

---

_**Assistant**_

你可以通过以下方式实现“入库签收列表”点击某一行（如 PN20250422002）进入详情页，并在详情页展示对应数据：

**1. 列表页 warehouse_receiving_list.html：**
- 在 `handleItemClick(planCode)` 里，跳转到详情页并带上 plan_code 参数，例如：
```js
function handleItemClick(planCode) {
    window.location.href = `warehouse_receiving_detail.html?plan_code=${planCode}`;
}
```
- 这样点击 PN20250422002 时会跳转到 `warehouse_receiving_detail.html?plan_code=PN20250422002`。

**2. 详情页 warehouse_receiving_detail.html：**
- 页面加载时读取 URL 参数，根据 plan_code 加载并渲染对应的签收信息和待签收列表。
- 你可以用如下 JS 代码获取参数并根据 plan_code 显示不同内容（这里只做前端模拟）：

```js
// 获取URL参数
function getQueryParam(name) {
    const url = new URL(window.location.href);
    return url.searchParams.get(name);
}
const planCode = getQueryParam('plan_code') || 'PN20250422001';

// 根据planCode选择数据
const detailData = {
    'PN20250422001': {
        planCode: 'PN20250422001',
        purchaseOrder: 'ST20250417002',
        supplier: '广州鞋业有限公司',
        receivedCount: 0,
        totalCount: 180,
        receivedBox: 0,
        waitList: [
            // ...你的模拟数据
        ]
    },
    'PN20250422002': {
        planCode: 'PN20250422002',
        purchaseOrder: 'ST20250418001',
        supplier: '广州鞋业有限公司',
        receivedCount: 10,
        totalCount: 50,
        receivedBox: 1,
        waitList: [
            {
                fnsku: 'X00302LCPX',
                img: '',
                spu: 'ST210628UB',
                color_size: '栗色/10',
                sku: 'ST210628UBCOGNAC100',
                received: 5,
                total: 30
            },
            {
                fnsku: 'X00302LCPY',
                img: '',
                spu: 'ST210628UB',
                color_size: '黑色/9',
                sku: 'ST210628UBBLACK9',
                received: 5,
                total: 20
            }
        ]
    }
};

// 渲染详情
const data = detailData[planCode];
document.getElementById('planCode').textContent = data.planCode;
document.getElementById('purchaseOrder').textContent = data.purchaseOrder;
document.getElementById('supplier').textContent = data.supplier;
document.getElementById('receivedCount').textContent = data.receivedCount;
document.getElementById('totalCount').textContent = data.totalCount;
document.getElementById('receivedBox').textContent = data.receivedBox;

// 渲染待签收列表
function renderWaitList() {
    const list = document.getElementById('waitList');
    list.innerHTML = data.waitList.map(item => `
        <div class="wait-item">
            <div class="wait-img">
                ${item.img ? `<img src="${item.img}" alt="" style="width:100%;height:100%;object-fit:cover;border-radius:4px;">` : ''}
                <div class="wait-fnsku">${item.fnsku}</div>
            </div>
            <div class="wait-info">
                <div class="wait-row"><span class="label">货号：</span>${item.spu}</div>
                <div class="wait-row"><span class="label">颜色/尺码：</span>${item.color_size}</div>
                <div class="wait-sku"><span class="label">SKU：</span>${item.sku}</div>
            </div>
            <div class="wait-count-box">
                <div>
                    <div class="wait-count-label">已收/总数</div>
                    <span class="wait-count">${item.received}</span>/<span class="wait-total">${item.total}</span>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    `).join('');
}
renderWaitList();
```

**这样即可实现：**
- 列表页点击某行跳转详情页并带参数
- 详情页根据参数展示不同的签收信息和待签收列表

如需我帮你直接集成到代码中，请告知！

```diff
-            // 这里可扩展点击逻辑
+             window.location.href = `warehouse_receiving_detail.html?plan_code=${planCode}`;
          }
  
```


---

现在已实现如下联动：

- 在入库签收列表页，点击某一行（如 PN20250422002）会跳转到详情页，并带上 plan_code 参数。
- 详情页会根据 URL 参数 plan_code，自动渲染对应的签收信息和待签收列表。

你可以直接体验从列表到详情的跳转和数据展示。如果还需支持更多单据或有其他联动需求，欢迎继续反馈！

_**Assistant**_

你可以通过以下方式让“已收/总数”始终在同一行显示：

1. 给 `.wait-count-box` 增加 `text-align: center;` 和 `display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center;`，让内容垂直居中。
2. 给“已收/总数”数字部分加 `white-space: nowrap;`，防止换行。
3. 让“已收/总数”整体宽度略加大，保证数字有空间。

请参考如下样式调整：

```css

    align-items: center;

    white-space: nowrap;

    font-weight: bold;
    margin-right: 2px;
}
.wait-total {
    color: #222;
    font-size: 20px;
    font-weight: bold;
}
```

```js

    </div>

```

这样“已收/总数”会始终在同一行显示，且数字不会换行。你可以直接应用到你的页面。需要我帮你直接修改代码请回复！

```diff
+         function updateInfoArea() {
+             document.getElementById('receivedCount').textContent = receivedCount;
+             document.getElementById('receivedBox').textContent = receivedBoxSet.size;
+             // 更新待签收列表

+         document.getElementById('totalCount').textContent = detailData[planCode].totalCount;

          function renderWaitList() {
              const list = document.getElementById('waitList');
-             list.innerHTML = data.waitList.map(item => `
+             list.innerHTML = waitList.map(item => `
                  <div class="wait-item">
                      <div class="wait-img">
          }
          renderWaitList();
+         // 扫描箱码输入框逻辑
+         const scanInput = document.querySelector('.scan-input');
+         scanInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) {
+             if (e.key === 'Enter') {
+                 const boxCode = scanInput.value.trim();
+                 if (!boxCode) return;
+                 if (!boxs_data[boxCode]) {
+                     alert('箱码错误');
+                     scanInput.value = '';
+                     return;
+                 }
+                 if (receivedBoxSet.has(boxCode)) {
+                     alert('该箱码已签收');
+                     scanInput.value = '';
+                     return;
+                 }
+                 // 签收逻辑
+                 receivedBoxSet.add(boxCode);
+                 // 找到对应SKU，增加数量
+                 const boxInfo = boxs_data[boxCode];
+                 let found = false;
+                 for (let item of waitList) {
+                     if (item.fnsku === boxInfo.fnsku && item.sku === boxInfo.sku) {
+                         item.received += boxInfo.num;
+                         found = true;
+                         break;
+                     }
+                 }
+                 if (found) {
+                     receivedCount += boxInfo.num;
+                 }
+                 updateInfoArea();
+                 scanInput.value = '';
+             }
+         });
      </script>
  </body>
```

---

现在已实现如下功能：

- 在箱码输入框输入 boxs_data 里的箱码并回车，若箱码存在，则签收数量、已签收箱数、待签收列表的已收/总数会自动更新。
- 若箱码不存在于 boxs_data，则弹窗提示“箱码错误”。
- 已签收过的箱码再次输入会提示“该箱码已签收”，不会重复计数。

如需进一步优化交互或有其他签收逻辑需求，欢迎继续反馈！

_**User**_

确认签收按钮应该在图片中箭头所指的位置上

---

_**Assistant**_

明白！你希望【确认签收】按钮固定在内容区域的底部（即白色卡片底部），而不是整个页面的最底部。这样按钮会随着内容滚动而滚动，不会悬浮在页面外部。

实现方法如下：

1. **将按钮放在 `.container` 内部，紧贴内容底部**，而不是用 `position: fixed` 固定在页面底部。
2. **去除按钮的 `position: fixed` 和宽度限制**，让其自然跟随内容流动。

请参考如下修改：

```html
<!-- 在.container 内部内容最后插入按钮 -->
<div class="footer-btn-area" style="position: static; width: 100%; box-shadow: none; padding: 24px 0 0 0; background: none;">
    <button class="footer-btn" id="footerConfirmBtn">确认签收</button>
</div>
```

CSS建议调整如下（去掉 position: fixed、left、bottom、width、background、box-shadow）：

```css
.footer-btn-area {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    padding: 24px 0 0 0;
    background: none;
    box-shadow: none;
    position: static;
    width: 100%;
}
```

这样按钮就会像你图片中一样，始终在内容卡片的底部，页面滚动时也会跟随内容滚动。

如需我帮你直接修改代码，请回复！

---
